name: Overcome (itch) (Kytric)
description:
Overcome

A rougelike shooter with pixel art graphics.
Find your way through an ever changing dungeon.
Fight against countless monsters, steal their abilities and use them against themselves.
Find Treasures to improve your character to unlimited power.

Controls

Move - W A S D
Aim - Mouse
Shoot - Left Mouse Button
Special Ability - Right Mouse Button

Credits

Made by Kytric - Next Time Entertainment.
Some graphics by Fartfish (fartfish.itch.io) & Kenney (kenney.nl).

Notes

For the best game experience play the windows or linux version of the game.
Please share, rate and leave a comment if you liked it. Thank you!
